item.title: EP 400 - The Murder Demon In Your Mirror!
item.itunes:title: The Murder Demon In Your Mirror!
item.description:
Today we travel to Argentina to hunt the tiniest cryptid ever, and then we meet a man possessed by a mirror murder demon!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

 

Links:

 

Juy-juy

https://cryptidarchives.fandom.com/wiki/Juy-juy

 

Ucumar

https://cryptidarchives.fandom.com/wiki/Ucumar

 

ghost of the badland argentina

https://books.google.com/books?id=z9gMsCUtCZUC&pg=PA172&lpg=PA172&dq=ghost+of+the+badland+argentina&source=bl&ots=JVYpgpnh3T&sig=ACfU3U0L_zGKytVatIrnbUGIDoZ_xF_OKA&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj0xc_Z7f7nAhX4JDQIHfhgBlQQ6AEwBHoECAsQAQ#v=onepage&q=ghost%20of%20the%20badland%20argentina&f=false

Fantasma de los riscos

https://cryptidarchives.fandom.com/wiki/Fantasma_de_los_riscos

 

Salinella salve

https://cryptidarchives.fandom.com/wiki/Salinella_salve

 

Gone Missing, circa 1892

https://www.the-scientist.com/foundations/gone-missing-circa-1892-40412?archived_content=9BmGYHLCH6vLGNdd9YzYFAqV8S3Xw3L5

 

Suspect claims 'demon' incited murder

https://lacrossetribune.com/news/suspect-claims-demon-incited-murder/article_4d221faa-16b3-5b3b-be2a-38745b7023d8.html

 

Insanity defense dropped: Balzrina pleads guilty to murder of Sarah Dobbs

https://lacrossetribune.com/news/insanity-defense-dropped-balzrina-pleads-guilty-to-murder-of-sarah/article_2f48348f-3ac0-5c56-8694-2abc11d1dfaf.html

 

TWO PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATIONS ORDERED FOR MURDER SUSPECT MATTHEW BALZRINA SAYS A DEMON TOLD HIM TO KILL SARAH DOBBS.

https://madison.com/news/local/two-psychiatric-evaluations-ordered-for-murder-suspect-matthew-balzrina-says/article_c1d28907-4454-50e6-b123-21414032fde2.html

 

Balzrina asked for exorcism, investigator says

https://lacrossetribune.com/news/balzrina-asked-for-exorcism-investigator-says/article_b8c4dcf9-d758-54cd-9abc-f5e908cef787.html

 

Mirror Demon Demands Murder

http://www.abovetopsecret.com/forum/thread145712/pg1

Suspect arrested in fatal fire

https://lacrossetribune.com/news/suspect-arrested-in-fatal-fire/article_58170855-8475-5083-8315-ae7d52b257b1.html

 

La Crosse Man To Spend Life In Prison

https://www.weau.com/home/headlines/2776061.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Dead Rabbit Exposed By Smashers_25 (Instagram)

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
